Ring of the Serpent.NAME: Ring of the Serpent
Ring of the Serpent.FLAVOR: Your ring has morphed and changed forms.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, draw #b2 additional card.

FrozenCore.NAME: Frozen Core
FrozenCore.FLAVOR: The crack in your core has been filled with a pulsating cold energy.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #bCracked #bCore. At the end of your turn, #yChannel #b1 #yFrost.

HolyWater.NAME: Holy Water
HolyWater.FLAVOR: Collected from a time before the Spire.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #pPure #pWater. At the start of each combat, add #b3 #yMiracles into your hand. Whenever you play a #yMiracle, draw a card.

Empty Cage.NAME: Empty Cage
Empty Cage.FLAVOR: "How unusual to cage that which you worship." - Ranwid
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, remove #b2 cards from your deck. The first time you shuffle your deck each turn gain [E] .

Pandora's Box.NAME: Pandora's Box
Pandora's Box.FLAVOR: You have a bad feeling about opening this.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, play the top card of your draw pile.

Astrolabe.NAME: Astrolabe
Astrolabe.FLAVOR: A tool to glean invaluable knowledge from the stars.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, reduce the cost of #b3 random cards by #b1 and upgrade them.
